ygData.subject: Help on Races
ygData.msgSnippet: YOUR IN OUR WORLD NOW!!!......hehe Well I can only tell you WHY I chose to be a Dark Elf as opposed to all the other races.....I cant tell you ABOUT the pros
ygData.messageBody:
YOUR IN OUR WORLD NOW!!!......hehe

Well I can only tell you WHY I chose to be a Dark Elf as opposed
to all the other races.....I cant tell you ABOUT the pros and cons of all
cuase I havent played them all but......ok we have Dark Elf, High Elf,
Gnome, Human, and Erudite.....I chose the Dark Elf.....heres why.....The
second rank of spell for the Enchanter allows both invisibility as well as
the ability to morph yourlsef into a Half Elf and a Human......so this right
here sold it for me......what better tehn a char that can go into ANY
TOWN!!>....as a Half Elf you can go into anytown.....and as a Dark Elf you
can go into all three evil towns.......that was it right there.....that is
the whole BIG DEAL for me.....HAHAHAH!!!.....
but seriously.....this to me would allow for an enchanter to shine.....the
Dark Elf has both high Charisma and semi high intelligence......these make
for great enchanters......you bump the wisdom and the charisma a little more
with your bonus attributes and you have your self the IDEAL enchatner fit
for jewelcrafting......which is where Im going with this.....heres why I
DIDNT pick any of the other races.......the HighElf and the Gnome are lumped
into the same categorie here.......all of Faydwer is WAAAAYYYY over
crowded.....I dont know what its like now but within the second week of
release there were over 162 players in Greater Faydark......and ths was
during OFF peak times.......Human.....well I personalyl feel that if your
gonna play EQ then dont play a human......by all means ppl if you wanna play
a human play UO.....this is a game of FANTASY and altered races.......BE
THOSE ALTERED RACES!! (only human I will make is a human Necromancer out of
Freeport)......ok so then lastly we have the Erudite and I personally would
have gone with this race as a second choice......if I wouldnt have gone evil
I would have gone with this char.......BUT I didnt like the location.....I
actually muled some (no flames please, I worked for my equipment either way
its mine) stuff over to my enchanter to get him started so I needed a much
better locationa nd since I have a 16th lvl Druid in
Rivervale.......Nektulos Forest just seemed like the right
logistics.......so those were my reasons.......have fun.....YOU WILL LOVE
THIS GAME!!!!


Dymond the Enchantress
